${modID}:AbsolutePowerPower.NAME: Absolute Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%s [E] every time you deal damage ending with a 9.

${modID}:BarrierPower.NAME: Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next #b%s times you would lose HP or #y${modID}:Temp_HP.

${modID}:CountdownAgami.NAME: Agami
DESCRIPTIONS: On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, convert this enemy's #y${modID}:LV to #y${modID}:KR and #y${modID}:Detonate it.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, convert this enemy's #y${modID}:LV to #y${modID}:KR and #y${modID}:Detonate it.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, convert this enemy's #y${modID}:LV to #y${modID}:KR and #y${modID}:Detonate it #b%s times.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, convert this enemy's #y${modID}:LV to #y${modID}:KR and #y${modID}:Detonate it #b%s times.

${modID}:CountdownAttack.NAME: Attack
DESCRIPTIONS: On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, deal #b%s damage.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, deal #b%s damage.

${modID}:CountdownDefend.NAME: Defend
DESCRIPTIONS: On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, gain #b%s Block.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, gain #b%s Block.

${modID}:CountdownDraw.NAME: Draw
DESCRIPTIONS: On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, draw #b%s cards.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, draw #b%s card.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, draw #b%s cards.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, draw #b%s card.

${modID}:CountdownFlee.NAME: Mercy
DESCRIPTIONS: On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, escape from a non-boss combat and receive no rewards. NL Cannot be triggered another way.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, escape from a non-boss combat and receive no rewards. NL Cannot be triggered another way.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, escape from a non-boss combat and receive only gold rewards. NL Cannot be triggered another way.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, escape from a non-boss combat and receive only gold rewards. NL Cannot be triggered another way.

${modID}:CountdownPounce.NAME: Pounce
DESCRIPTIONS: On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, deal #b%s damage. Deals double damage if the target doesn't intend to attack.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, deal #b%s damage. Deals double damage if the target doesn't intend to attack.

${modID}:CountdownRuins.NAME: Ruins
DESCRIPTIONS: On #yExpiry after playing #b%s cards, deal #b%s damage. At the start of turn deal #b%s damage and increase this amount by #b%s.
On #yExpiry after playing #b%s card, deal #b%s damage. At the start of turn deal #b%s damage and increase this amount by #b%s.

${modID}:Determination.NAME: DETERMINATION
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next #b%s time you would lose HP from Attacks.
Prevent the next #b%s times you would lose HP from Attacks.

${modID}:EvolvePower.NAME: Evolve
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%s #y${modID}:LV whenever you play a card.

${modID}:GarbageDumpPower.NAME: Garbage Dump
DESCRIPTIONS: When you ${modID}:Waste #yEnergy, lose #b%s HP and deal #b%s damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FallenDown.NAME: Fallen Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive #b%s%% more damage from non-Attacks.

${modID}:GladDummy.NAME: Glad Dummy
DESCRIPTIONS: Gives you 2 block on its turn. Whenever the dummy gains a power or gains Block, so does its #y${modID}:SoulBound %s.

${modID}:Karma.NAME: Karma
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes #b%s damage whenever you lose HP or Temp HP, but cannot kill on its own.

${modID}:KillWithKindnessPower.NAME: Kindness
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you buff an enemy, it gains #b%s #yVulnerable.

${modID}:LV_Enemy.NAME: LV
DESCRIPTIONS: #yAttacks deal #b%s additional damage.

${modID}:LV_Hero.NAME: LV
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yAttack will gain #b%s #y${modID}:XP.

${modID}:Overcome.NAME: Overcome
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%s card which fails to play is #y${modID}:Persevered. Removed on turn end.
Your next #b%s cards which fail to play are #y${modID}:Persevered. Removed 1 on turn end.

${modID}:Mercied.NAME: Mercied
DESCRIPTIONS: #yAttacks deal #b%s less damage this turn.

${modID}:PreventLVLoss.NAME: Prevent LV Loss
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next #b%s time you would lose #y${modID}:LV this turn.
Prevent the next #b%s times you would lose #y${modID}:LV this turn.

${modID}:RecyclePower.NAME: Recycle
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next time you would #y${modID}:Waste Energy. Gain #b%s #y${modID}:Temp_HP per #y${modID}:Wasted energy saved.

${modID}:RememberBraveryPower.NAME: Bravery
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would lose #y${modID}:LV, a random card in your hand gains equivalent #y${modID}:XP.
Whenever you would lose #y${modID}:LV, #b%s random cards in your hand gain equivalent #y${modID}:XP.

${modID}:RememberKindnessPower.NAME: Kindness
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy gains Block, it gains #b%s Weak.

${modID}:RememberPatiencePower.NAME: Patience
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have #b%s or more cards in your hand, #yRetain #b%s cards this turn.

${modID}:TornNotebookPower.NAME: Torn Notebook
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b%s times you lose HP or Temp HP, gain 1 ${modID}:Barrier.

${modID}:SoulBound.NAME: SoulBound
DESCRIPTIONS: Bound to %s. The owner dies when the target does.

${modID}:Spared.NAME: Spared
DESCRIPTIONS: If this enemy is attacked, they will instead gain #y${modID}:Betrayed.

${modID}:Betrayed.NAME: Betrayed
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy gains twice as much #y${modID}:LV when attacked.

${modID}:NEO.NAME: NEO
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever the target gains Block, it takes #b%s damage for each point of Block it has. Reduced by 1 on turn end.

${modID}:NewHome.NAME: New Home
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you upgrade a ${modID}:Countdown, upgrade a random card in your hand and give it 3 #y${modID}:XP.

${modID}:NonAttackPower.NAME: Powerless
DESCRIPTIONS: You next #b%s card this turn deals non-attack damage, is unaffected by Block modifiers, and isn't treated as a card played.
You next #b%s cards this turn deal non-attack damage, are unaffected by Block modifiers, and aren't treated as a card played.

${modID}:Vitality.NAME: Vitality
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases #y${modID}:Temp_HP gained from cards by #b%s

${modID}:FavouriteNumberPower.NAME: Demonify
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%s Attack this turn will end in 9. NL (You will gain #yLV equal to the difference).
Your next #b%s Attacks this turn will end in 9. NL (You will gain #yLV equal to the difference).

${modID}:LVRitual.NAME: Ritual
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b%s #y${modID}:LV.

${modID}:MadDummy.NAME: Mad Dummy
DESCRIPTIONS: Deals 3 damage to you on its turn. Whenever the dummy takes damage, so does its #y${modID}:SoulBound %s.

${modID}:LesserDuplication.NAME: Lesser Duplication
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next cost 0 or 1 card is played twice this turn.
Your next #b
cost 0 or 1 cards are played twice this turn.
${modID}:LesserDuplication.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an weaker version of the base game's Duplication power from Reliquary

${modID}:Hurt.NAME: Hurt
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, target takes #b%s more attack damage.

${modID}:NewHomePower.NAME: New Home
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each turn is #y${modID}:Monochromed.
The first #b%s cards you play each turn are #y${modID}:Monochromed.
